mapper.select: SELECT p.product_code AS productCode, p.product_name AS productName, p.asset_type_flag AS assetTypeFlag, c.company_name AS companyName, c.company_type_flag AS companyTypeFlag FROM tbl_product_company pc LEFT JOIN tbl_product p ON pc.product_key = p.product_key Left JOIN tbl_company c ON pc.company_key = c.company_key WHERE pc.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.product_key ASC, c.company_key ASC
